### Resources
Two outside resources were used for converting the XML files to JSON and CSV.

#### Code Beautify
XML files were converted to JSON via [Code Beautify](http://www.codebeautify.org).

#### Convert CSV
XML files were converted to CSV via [Convert CSV](http://www.convertcsv.com/xml-to-csv.htm).
